# mytemplatesabichat

This package contains my personal rmarkdown templates:

* an improved version of default rmarkdown,
* xaringan presentations:
  * during my PhD,
  * for my lessons,
  * for <a href="https://stateofther.github.io" target="_blank">State of the R</a> (2 versions).
  
  
You can also use my package default setup with `mytemplatesabichat::init_package()`.
  

Installation:

```{r, eval=FALSE}
# install.packages(remotes)
remotes::install_github("abichat/mytemplatesabichat")
```
